properties.name: reports.folder
properties.description: Folder the weekly reports use in Google Drive

properties.name: reports.pattern
properties.description: Regexp pattern to match a valid weekly report

properties.name: googleapi.drive.list.uri
properties.description: Google drive query to retrieve list of files from a folder

properties.name: googleapi.drive.get.uri
properties.description: Google drive query to retrieve contents of a file
